name: royal_spear

refinement_effect.refine_one: Upon damaging an opponent, increase Crit Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Upon damaging an opponent, increase Crit Rate by 10%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Upon damaging an opponent, increase Crit Rate by 12%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Upon damaging an opponent, increase Crit Rate by 14%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Upon damaging an opponent, increase Crit Rate by 16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

description: The polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.
